conversations.content: Please save all order invoices from the current month and save them to /user/invoices. After that, calculating the sum of all payments found within /user/invoices.

<|Function_Thought|>
To complete the user's request, I need to start by retrieving the current day to determine the relevant month for order invoices. After obtaining the current date, I will proceed to fetch the user's order history. Finally, I will retrieve invoices related to those orders, specifically filtering for the current month, and then save them to the specified directory.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_current_day()]<|/Function_Call|>

<|Function_Thought|>
The current date is May 19, 2024. I will now proceed to view the order history to find the invoices for orders placed in May 2024.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[view_order_history()]<|/Function_Call|>

{'Order 1': {'order_id': 'ORDER-104674', 'product_name': 'Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-04-18', 'delivery_date': '2024-04-20', 'product_id': 'P030'}, 'Order 2': {'order_id': 'ORDER-107495', 'product_name': 'TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-06', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-10', 'product_id': 'P045'}, 'Order 3': {'order_id': 'ORDER-112543', 'product_name': 'Portable SSD 1TB', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-19', 'product_id': 'P009'}, 'Order 4': {'order_id': 'ORDER-113219', 'product_name': 'SpeedStep Running Shoes', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': None, 'product_id': 'P023'}}

<|Function_Thought|>
The user's order history includes several orders, but we are interested in those placed in May 2024. The relevant orders are:
1. ORDER-107495 - TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse
2. ORDER-112543 - Portable SSD 1TB
3. ORDER-113219 - SpeedStep Running Shoes

Now, I need to fetch the invoices for these orders and save them to the directory `/user/invoices`. I will start with the first order.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-107495")]<|/Function_Call|>
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The invoice for the order ORDER-107495 has been sent to the email inbox, but it was not saved to the specified directory. I will now retrieve the invoice for ORDER-112543.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-112543")]<|/Function_Call|>
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The invoice for the order ORDER-112543 has also been sent to the email inbox. I will now retrieve the invoice for the final order, ORDER-113219.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-113219")]<|/Function_Call|>
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
All attempts to retrieve invoices for the orders in May 2024 have resulted in invoices being sent to the email inbox rather than saved directly to `/user/invoices`. Since I cannot retrieve the invoices directly, I will need to guide Emma on how to manually save those invoices from her email inbox. After that, I can calculate the sum of all payments once the files are present.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|>
Please check your email inbox for the invoices related to your recent orders. After saving them to the directory `/user/invoices`, I can assist you with calculating the total payments from those invoices.
<|/Final_Answer|>
